sources.title: From the Heart - A Second Chance for First Love (LOVE FILM full movie German, Movies 2025)

metadata.Plot: When Sameer asks for Nandini's hand in marriage her family refuses. They have already chosen a husband for their daughter. Sameer returns to Italy. When Vanraj, Nandini's husband realizes that his new bride has been in love with someone else, he is prepared to sacrifice his love for her and take her to Italy to be reunited with her true love, Sameer.
metadata.Writer: Sanjay Leela Bhansali, Amrik Gill, Pratap Karvat
metadata.Actors: Aishwarya Rai Bachchan, Salman Khan, Ajay Devgn
